attributes.action: Increase the services we have for mental health in Scunthorpe.
attributes.background:
This is personal for me, my diagnosis first came about in 2014, still now I haven't had the support I need, and people still look at me asif I should be OK. 
Most deaths are suicide, our stories are heard but not listened to. I don't want another life ruined by the lack of ability to support.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. Specific services in your local area are likely to be the responsibility of local NHS bodies and/or your local council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
